Description copied from interface: ViewListener
Fires before a click is processed. Returns false to cancel the default action.

Specified by:

doBeforeSelect

public boolean doBeforeSelect(View view,
                              com.google.gwt.user.client.Element node,
                              com.google.gwt.user.client.Element[] selections)
Description copied from interface: ViewListener
Fires before a selection is made. If any handlers return false, the selection is cancelled.

Specified by:
doBeforeSelect in interface ViewListener
Parameters:
view - the view
node - the node to be selected
selections - Array of currently selected nodes
Returns:
false to cancel the selection
